pages.text: Travel between planets using your rocket. Each planet requires different preparation and has unique challenges. Plan your missions carefully!

pages.title: Selecting Destination
pages.text: When launching in a rocket:$(br)$(br)1. Launch the rocket (press SPACE)$(br)2. Reach space (high altitude)$(br)3. The planet selection GUI will open automatically$(br)4. Choose your destination$(br)5. Land carefully!

pages.title: Mission Planning
pages.text: Before traveling:$(br)$(br)- Check planet atmosphere$(br)- Pack oxygen if needed$(br)- Bring enough fuel$(br)- Prepare for different gravity and alien life-forms
